items.name: Advanced Iron Lure
items.description: The Advanced Iron Lure can be attached to a Fishing Rod or a Basic Fishing Trap / Advanced Fishing Trap to provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. The capture zone size increase widens the size of the capture area during the fishing minigame, increasing the success chance of catching a fish. Like all Lures , the Advanced Iron Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

items.name: Aluminium Ingot
items.description: Aluminium Ingot is the refined resource crafted from Aluminium Ore .

items.name: Cold Steel Bolt
items.description: The Cold Steel Bolt is ammunition used with a Crossbow . In addition to projectile damage, it has a chance to inflict a Freeze modifier that slows and damages enemies.

items.name: Cold Steel Ingot
items.description: Cold Steel Ingots are a refined resource crafted from Steel Ingots and Super Cooled Ice . Prospectors must use a Concrete Furnace or an Electric Furnace to refine the resources listed below into a Cold Steel Ingot.

items.name: Cold Steel Javelin
items.description: The Cold Steel Javelin is a variant of the Cold Steel Spear that can only be thrown. Deals frost damage on hit and has a 15% chance to apply a unique debuff to targets while dealing periodic frost damage. Excels when used against Fauna that have a weakness to frost. . When the Freeze modifier does proc, periodic frost damage is dealt to the target over the span of 10 seconds. Fauna with:

items.name: Copper Attachment
items.description: Copper Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked the Tool Attachment Pack tech.

items.name: Copper Bolt
items.description: The Copper Bolt is ammunition used with a Crossbow . Like arrows and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass. Crafted in batches of 5.

items.name: Copper Cluster Lamp
items.description: The Copper Cluster Lamp is a simple low output lamp that does not require fuel to operate but does require water to craft.

items.name: Copper Geode Lamp
items.description: The Copper Geode Lamp is a simple low output lamp that does not require fuel to operate but does require water to craft.
items.crafted_at: Crafted AtMasonry BenchAdvanced Masonry BenchElectric Masonry Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Crafted AtMasonry BenchAdvanced Masonry BenchElectric Masonry Bench

items.name: Copper Ingot
items.description: Copper Ingot is the refined resource crafted from Copper Ore .
items.crafted_at: Stone Furnace Concrete Furnace Electric Furnace

base_recipe.crafted_at: Stone Furnace Concrete Furnace Electric Furnace

items.name: Copper Monolith Lamp
items.description: The Copper Monolith Lamp is a simple low output lamp that does not require fuel to operate but does require water to craft.

items.name: Copper Nail
items.description: Copper Nail are used widely in crafting of items such as interior Interior Wood Building Pieces , and other items made of Refined Wood at the Carpentry Bench and Machining Bench .

items.name: Copper Wire
items.description: Copper Wire is used in a variety of high-end buildings and components and is crafted in batches of 5.

items.name: Deluxe Leather Saddle
items.description: The Deluxe Leather Saddle is a saddle for Mounts made with cured leather. It is available as part of the Creature Comforts DLC and is a cosmetic change to the Basic Riding Saddle that provides no additional attributes.

items.name: Iron Bolt
items.description: The Iron Bolt is ammunition used with a Crossbow . Like arrows and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass. Crafted in batches of 5.

items.name: Iron Cupboard
items.description: The Iron Cupboard comes with 50 inventory slots and can be used to safely store valuable resources. Unlike the Wood Cupboard , it does not require shelter and can be placed outside without risk of taking damage during storms.

items.name: Iron Ingot
items.description: Iron Ingot is the refined resource crafted from Iron Ore and is one of the most used materials in the Tier 2  Tech Tree and beyond.
items.crafted_at: Stone Furnace Concrete Furnace Electric Furnace

base_recipe.crafted_at: Stone Furnace Concrete Furnace Electric Furnace

items.name: Iron Javelin
items.description: The Iron Javelin is a variant of the Iron Spear that can only be thrown and is an upgrade over the Tier 1  Javelins.

items.name: Iron Lure
items.description: The Iron Lure can be attached to a Fishing Rod or a Basic Fishing Trap / Advanced Fishing Trap to provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. Like all Lures , the Iron Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

items.name: Iron Nail
items.description: Iron Nail are used widely in crafting of items such as Stone Building Pieces , and Iron Tools .

items.name: Iron Shears
items.description: The Iron Shears are use to shear Sheep to obtain Wool . Can cause 30-40 Melee damage

items.name: Iron Sickle
items.description: Used by 'attacking' plants such as shrubs, Reed Flower , Wheat , etc. Sickles significantly increase the yield of plants when harvesting.
items.crafted_at: the Anvil Bench with the following resources:

base_recipe.crafted_at: the Anvil Bench with the following resources:

items.name: Leather Attachment
items.description: Leather Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked the Tool Attachment Pack tech.

items.name: Leather Backpack
items.description: The Leather Backpack is a must need when mining ores, or taking long trips across Icarus, fit everything you need inside for survival!

items.name: Medium Iron Crate
items.description: A Medium Iron Crate, use it to safely store valuable resources. Unlike the Medium Wood Crate , it does not require shelter and can be placed outside (immune to storm damage).

items.name: Platinum Ingot
items.description: Platinum Ingot is the refined resource crafted from Platinum Ore .

items.name: Refined Gold
items.description: Refined Gold is the refined resource crafted from Gold Ore .

items.name: Refined Wood
items.description: Refined Wood is used for the construction of Interior Wood Buildings , Refined Wood Deployables, and various Tools.

items.name: Refined Wood Lure
items.description: The Refined Wood Lure can be attached to a Fishing Rod or a Basic Fishing Trap / Advanced Fishing Trap to provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. The capture zone size increase widens the size of the capture area during the fishing minigame, increasing the success chance of catching a fish. Like all Lures , the Refined Wood Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

items.name: Rope
items.description: Intermediate crafting item used as a component of many recipes.
items.crafted_at: Crafted atCrafting BenchTextiles BenchAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Crafted atCrafting BenchTextiles BenchAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

items.name: Small Iron Crate
items.description: A Small Iron Crate, use it to safely store valuable resources. Unlike the Small Wood Crate , it does not require shelter and can be placed outside (immune to storm damage).

items.name: Steel Bloom
items.description: Steel Bloom is a crafted resource that can be smelted in a Stone Furnace , Concrete Furnace or Electric Furnace to make a Steel Ingot . It can made made from Iron Ore or Iron Ingot and Coal Ore or Charcoal .

items.name: Steel Bolt
items.description: The Steel Bolt is ammunition used with a Crossbow . Like arrows and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass. Crafted in batches of 5.

items.name: Steel Heater Shield
items.description: Background information on the Steel Heater Shield can be found here .

items.name: Steel Ingot
items.description: Steel Ingot is the refined resource crafted from Steel Bloom , prospectors may use a Stone Furnace , Concrete Furnace , or Electric Furnace .

items.name: Steel Javelin
items.description: The Steel Javelin is a variant of the Steel Spear that can only be thrown. A cheap upgrade to the Iron Javelin that increases projectile damage with a lower break chance, but is locked until prospectors reach level 20.

items.name: Steel Rebar
items.description: Steel Rebar is a critical component of Concrete Structures , and is solely used for this purpose.

items.name: Steel Screw
items.description: Steel Screw is used in crafting high end tools, weapons, and structures like Aluminium Buildings .

items.name: Titanium Ingot
items.description: Titanium Ingot is the refined resource crafted from Titanium Ore , is used widely in Tier 4  crafting recipes.
